title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - for inward shift in supply; a decrease in supply

  • 1 - for movement along the supply curve; an increase in the quantity supplied or supply curve does not change
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for inward shift in supply; a decrease in supply

  • 1 - for movement along the supply curve; an increase in the quantity supplied or supply curve does not change

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for inward shift in supply; a decrease in supply

  • 1 - for movement along the supply curve; an increase in the quantity supplied or supply curve does not change

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for inward shift in supply; a decrease in supply

  • 1 - for movement along the supply curve; an increase in the quantity supplied or supply curve does not change

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
4 Points

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)

The student earns two of the following points:

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)

The student earns three of the following points:

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for import Market B: shift inward (decrease) supply: need correct graph

  • 1 - leading to increase price and reduced quantity in market B (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation

  • 1 - domestic Market A: shift out (increase) in demand need correct graph +verbal linkage to the price increase in Import Market B in part (b-i) below

  • 1 - leading to increased price and increased quantity in market A (either in a correct graph or a verbal explanation)

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 Points

  • 1 - for supply shifts in (decrease): leading to a price increase and a decrease in quantity on a correctly labeled graph
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for supply shifts in (decrease): leading to a price increase and a decrease in quantity on a correctly labeled graph

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for supply shifts in (decrease): leading to a price increase and a decrease in quantity on a correctly labeled graph

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

1 - for MRP1 shifts out due to an increase in the output price

1 - for labor supply to the firm (must be perfect elastic or horizontal) shifts up following the increase in the wage rate
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for MRP1 shifts out due to an increase in the output price

  • 1 - for labor supply to the firm (must be perfect elastic or horizontal) shifts up following the increase in the wage rate

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for MRP1 shifts out due to an increase in the output price

  • 1 - for labor supply to the firm (must be perfect elastic or horizontal) shifts up following the increase in the wage rate

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for MRP1 shifts out due to an increase in the output price

  • 1 - for labor supply to the firm (must be perfect elastic or horizontal) shifts up following the increase in the wage rate
